name: OpenSense Labs
description:
OpenSense Labs is a global premium full-service Drupal agency. We specialize in Drupal & Product engineering and focus on delivering experience platforms to ensure client success and satisfaction across different industries.
We are a fully distributed team located in India, US, France, UK, Germany and Singapore currently.
Founded in late 2015, OSL has worked with clients in verticals such as Education, FMCG, SaaS and Non-Profits. Our clients range from governments and large corporations to non-profits and startups.
Our Expertise:
Our core expertise lies in Drupal 8 development, Drupal 7 to 8 migration, and Drupal performance tuning.
Drupal Staff Augmentation
Strategy and Consulting
Drupal Commerce
AngularJS & React Development
Drupal Personalisation & CRO
Mobile Presence/Sites Implementation
Responsive Design
Drupal Site Audit [Best Practices / Performance / SEO / Accessibility
Drupal Support & Maintenance
Technology experience:
Frameworks
Drupal7
Drupal 8
Symphony
Databases
MariaDB, MySql
Redis, Memcached
MongoDB
Search
Apache Solr
Elastic Search
Infrastructure
AWS
Continuous Integration with Jenkins
Acquia Cloud
Pantheon
Drop us a line at hello@opensenselabs.com to discuss your development needs.
OpenSense Labs is also one of the proud contributors to Drupal community.
https://www.drupal.org/opensense-labs
